lines.text: ...I think we've been barking up the wrong tree this whole time!
We've been assuming that either Slick or one of the two wizards fired the gun...
But we've ignored the fourth culprit, right before our eyes!
Besides, uh, the one that's stuck standing.
You know dang well who I'm talking about! %CTHEYRE% right there!
No hands, you say! Hooves can't fire a gun, you say!
Oh, but you underestimate the dexterity of a goat's tongue!
Now's not the time for modesty, punk! You're on thin ice!
It's a figure of speech! It means I've almost cornered you and your caprine criminal conspiracy!
(Yeah, %THEYRE% gonna go on like this for a bit.)
